mapper.select: WITH CARTVIEW AS ( SELECT DISTINCT CART_PROD, CART_MEMBER FROM CART ), CARTMEMBER AS ( SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, CART_PROD FROM CARTVIEW INNER JOIN MEMBER ON (CART_MEMBER = MEM_ID) ), PRODVIEW AS ( SELECT PROD.*, LPROD.*, BUYER.* FROM PROD INNER JOIN LPROD ON (PROD_LGU = LPROD_GU) INNER JOIN BUYER ON (PROD_BUYER = BUYER_ID) ) SELECT PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_LGU, PROD_BUYER, PROD_COST, PROD_PRICE, PROD_SALE, PROD_OUTLINE, PROD_DETAIL, PROD_IMG, PROD_TOTALSTOCK, TO_DATE(PROD_INSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), PROD_PROPERSTOCK, PROD_SIZE, PROD_COLOR, PROD_DELIVERY, PROD_UNIT, PROD_QTYIN, PROD_QTYSALE, PROD_MILEAGE, LPROD_NM, BUYER_ID, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_CHARGER, BUYER_ADD1, MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL FROM PRODVIEW LEFT OUTER JOIN CARTMEMBER ON (PROD_ID = CART_PROD) WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId}
